Text: Thank you very much.Awesome movie..Seen on bluray.com that this will be released,can't wait to see it...

Can't wait to see it again myself :)

Saw this when I was in college a few years back, but as my memory fails me...It'll be like seeing it for the first time!

Yeah... Thank You very much.

Do you know by chance if There's going to be a Cinefile's 720p of "The Treasure Of The Sierra Madre (1948)" too ?
Fantastic release, everything is right: flawless video quality, correct aspect ratio, best audio, text subs.  Thank you.
